goal_summary: Your journey to a healthier you begins now! By consistently following this plan, you're set to achieve your weight loss target of 82 kg in 8 weeks. Stay disciplined, enjoy the process, and celebrate every small victory! Remember to listen to your body and adjust as needed.

weeks.focus: Establishing Routine & Building Foundation: Focus on mastering basic movements and portion control.

meals.description: Oats cooked with skim milk, topped with 1/2 cup mixed berries and a scoop of whey protein powder (30g).
Grilled Chicken Breast (150g) with 1 cup brown rice and a large serving of mixed vegetable stir-fry (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots).
One medium apple with 1 tablespoon natural peanut butter.
Moong Dal Soup (1.5 cups) with 1 whole wheat Roti and a large bowl of cucumber-tomato salad.

workout.description: Full Body Strength Training: Squats (3x10), Push-ups (3xMax), Dumbbell Rows (3x10/arm), Lunges (3x10/leg), Plank (3x45s). 10 min warm-up,5 min cool-down.

meals.description: Paneer Bhurji (100g paneer) with 2 small Multigrain Rotis and a side of green chutney.
Vegetable Pulao (1.5 cups brown rice with mixed vegetables) served with 1 cup plain Greek yogurt and a side salad.
A handful of almonds (15-20) and a cup of green tea.
Baked Fish (150g Basa/Tilapia) with steamed broccoli and bell peppers. Seasoned with herbs and lemon.

workout.description: Moderate Intensity Cardio: Brisk walking or jogging for 45 minutes. Focus on maintaining a steady pace.

meals.description: Two whole egg Omelette with spinach and mushrooms, served with 2 slices of whole wheat toast.
Chana Masala (1.5 cups) with 2 small whole wheat rotis and a side of cucumber raita.
Sprouted Moong Salad (1 cup) with chopped onions, tomatoes, and lemon juice.
Chicken and Vegetable Curry (150g chicken) with light coconut milk, served with a small portion of quinoa (1/2 cup cooked).

workout.description: Upper Body Strength & Core: Dumbbell Press (3x10), Lat Pulldowns (3x10), Overhead Press (3x10), Bicep Curls (3x12), Triceps Extensions (3x12), Russian Twists (3x15/side).

meals.description: Large bowl of fruit salad (banana, apple, orange, pomegranate) with 1 cup plain Greek yogurt and a sprinkle of chia seeds.
Dal Tadka (1.5 cups) with 1 cup brown rice and a mixed vegetable sabzi (e.g., Aloo Gobi).
A glass of Buttermilk (Chaas) with a small handful of roasted chana.
Tofu Scramble (150g tofu) with plenty of colorful vegetables (bell peppers, onions, spinach), seasoned with Indian spices. Noextra carbs.

workout.description: Active Recovery / Mobility: 45 minutes of Yoga or dynamic stretching. Focus on flexibility and light movement to aid recovery.

meals.description: Poha (1.5 cups) made with brown poha, peas, peanuts, and lemon juice. Served with 1 hard-boiled egg.
Lean Lamb/Mutton Curry (150g meat) with 1 small multigrain Roti and a side of green bean sabzi.
A medium pear and 1/4cup roasted pumpkin seeds.
Palak Paneer (150g paneer in spinach gravy) served with a small bowl of Tandoori Salad (no dressing).

workout.description: Lower Body Strength & HIIT: Goblet Squats (3x12), Romanian Deadlifts (3x10), Glute Bridges (3x15), Calf Raises (3x20). Followed by 15 min HIIT: 30s sprint/30s rest x 10 rounds.

meals.description: Besan Cheela (2 medium) with finely chopped vegetables (onion, capsicum) and a side of mint chutney.
Rajma Chawal (1.5 cups Rajma curry with 1 cup brown rice) and a kachumber salad.
1 cup plain Greek yogurt with 1/4 cup berries.
Chicken Seekh Kebab (3-4 pieces, baked/grilled) with a large mixed green salad and light lemon vinaigrette.

workout.description: Endurance Cardio: Cycling (outdoor or stationary) for 60 minutes at a steady, moderate pace.

meals.description: Masala Dalia (1.5 cups) cooked with mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, beans) and a sprinkle of chopped coriander.
Vegetarian Thali: 1 cup Mixed Dal, 1 cup Bhindi Sabzi, 2 small whole wheat Rotis, and a small bowl of Raita.
One banana and 10 walnuts.
Lentil & Vegetable Soup (1.5 cups) with a small portion of grilled paneer (50g) and a side of green salad.

workout.description: Rest Day: Focus on recovery, light stretching, and staying hydrated. Listen to your body.

weeks.focus: Increasing Intensity & Consistency: Aim for heavier weights or longer cardio, refining technique.

meals.description: Scrambled Eggs (3 whole eggs) with sautÃ©ed spinach and 1 slice whole wheat toast.
Tuna Salad (150g canned tuna in water, mixedwith light mayo/yogurt) in a whole wheat wrap with lots of lettuce and veggies.
Orange and a handful of almonds (10-12).
Chicken and Vegetable Clear Soup (1 cup chicken breast) with a small side of steamed quinoa (1/2 cup cooked).

workout.description: Full Body Strength Training: Deadlifts (3x8), Bench Press (3x10), Bent-over Rows (3x10), Overhead Press (3x10), Plank variations (3x45s). Increase weight from Week 1.

meals.description: Peanut Butter & Banana Smoothie: Skim milk, 1 scoop protein powder, 1 banana, 1 tbsp peanut butter.
Mix Veg Curry (1.5 cups) with 2 small Multigrain Rotis and a large greensalad.
Roasted Chana (1/2 cup) with chopped cucumber and a pinch of chaat masala.
Grilled Paneer Tikka (150g) with grilled bell peppers and onions, served with a mint chutney.

workout.description: Cardio: 50 minutes of brisk walking or light jogging with varied inclines/resistance.

meals.description: Masoor Dal Cheela (2 medium) served with a small bowl of plain Greek yogurt.
Chicken Keema (150g) with 1 whole wheat Roti and a side of mixed vegetable salad.
1 cup Black Coffee with a small fruit (e.g., kiwi).
Egg Curry (2-3 eggs) with a large portion of steamed green vegetables (e.g., cluster beans, spinach). No rice/roti.

workout.description: Upper Body & Core Strength: Dumbbell Flyes (3x12), Cable Rows (3x12), Arnold Press (3x10), Hammer Curls (3x12), Skullcrushers (3x12), Plank with shouldertaps (3x10/side).

meals.description: Dalia Khichdi (1.5 cups) with vegetables and a cup of plain curd.
Sambar (1.5 cups) with 2 small multi-grain Idlis and a side of coconut chutney.
A glass of fresh coconut water and 1/4 cup roasted cashews.

meals.description: Oats Upma (1.5 cups) with vegetables and a small bowl of plain curd.

Protein Bar (approx. 20g protein, check nutrition label).

workout.description: Lower Body & Core Strength: Barbell Squats (3x8), Leg Press (3x10), Hamstring Curls (3x12), Calf Raises (3x20), Bicycle Crunches (3x20/side). Increase weight from Week 1.

meals.description: Muesli (1 cup) with skim milk, 1/2 cup berries, and a tablespoon of flax seeds.
Palak Dal (1.5 cups) with 2 small whole wheat Rotis and a simple cucumber salad.
A glass of fresh orange juice (no added sugar) and a handful of roasted peanuts.

workout.description: High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT): 20 minutes of 1-minute intense activity (burpees, jump squats) followed by 30s rest. 10 min warm-up,10 min cool-down.

Greek Yogurt (1 cup) with 1/4 cup chopped mango (seasonal).
Tofu & Lentil Soup (1.5 cups) with a large bowl of mixed green salad, light vinaigrette.

workout.description: Yoga & Stretching: 60 minutes of gentle yoga or prolonged stretching session. Focus on flexibility and relaxation.

meals.description: Muesli (1 cup) with skim milk, 1/2 cup berries, and a tablespoon of ground flax seeds.
Mix Veg Thali: 1 cup Dal Makhani, 1 cup Baingan Bharta, 2 small Multigrain Rotis, and a side salad.
A medium orange and a handful of almonds (10-12).
Chicken Tikka (150g baked/grilled) with a large portion of grilled zucchini and capsicum.

workout.description: Full Body Circuit (Light): 3 rounds of 10-15 reps for 5-6 exercises (e.g., bodyweight squats, incline push-ups, band rows, planks). Minimal rest between exercises.

meals.description: Besan Cheela (2 medium) with finely chopped vegetables and a side of green chutney.
Egg Bhurji (3 eggs) with 1 whole wheat Roti and a side of chopped cucumber and tomato.
1 cup plain Greek yogurt with a sprinkle of chia seeds.
Lentil Soup (1.5 cups) with a generous portion of steamed carrots, beans, and broccoli.

workout.description: Light Cardio & Core: 30 minutes of walking or slow jogging. Followed by 15 minutes of core exercises (crunches, leg raises, side planks).

meals.description: Spinach & Paneer Paratha (2 small, minimal oil) with 1 cup plain curd.
Chicken and Vegetable Sandwich: 150g shredded chicken with lettuce, tomato, cucumber in 2 slices whole wheat bread.
A medium banana and a tablespoon of almond butter.
Fish & Vegetable Stew (150g white fish, carrots, potatoes, peas) with a touch of light coconut milk.

workout.description: Bodyweight Circuit: 3 rounds of 15-20 reps for squats, lunges, push-ups, planks, glute bridges. Focus on control and full range of motion.

meals.description: Vegetable Upma (1.5 cups) with a small bowl of plain curd.
Vegetarian Biryani (1.5 cups brown rice with mixed vegetables) and 1 cup raita.
A bowl of watermelon (1.5 cups) and 10 pistachios.
Roasted Vegetable Salad (broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini, cherry tomatoes) with 100g grilled paneer.

workout.description: Rest Day: Celebrate your achievement! Take this day to reflect, re-energize, and plan for your next steps in maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
